div.h1:
Break the loop.
Ship proof. Flip the trajectory.
div.p: This project exists for one reason: turning relentless effort into visible results. I‚Äôm the product architect‚Äîideas, flows, features, systems thinking. What was missing was a reliable bridge to execution under financial pressure and mental overload. Now the strategy is clear: structure + collaboration + daily output.

div.div: Astronomical peak ‚Üí a real, measurable moment. Symbolic frame ‚Üí finish under full light before the next season begins. Definition: complete, showable, closed (not perfect).

div.p:
Objective marker
A fixed point in time that stops endless looping and forces closure.

Visibility
A deadline designed for showing proof, not pitching potential.

Snow Moon energy
Clarity through obstacles. Finish what matters. Ship what‚Äôs real.

div.div: Two people. Two apps. One turnaround.
Break the vicious cycle and ship two proof apps before the Snow Moon deadline.
MVP first. No feature creep. Proof beats perception. Daily visible output.

div.p: Months of effort across IDEs, tutorials, and AI-assisted workflows. Not laziness. Not naivety. The cost was real: financial pressure, mental exhaustion, and a loop of ‚Äútrying without proof.‚Äù

Meanwhile, a hidden asset grew: chats full of ideas, curated tutorials, dozens of experiments and repos. Centralized, that becomes a data vault‚Äîdocumentation, workflows, templates, and a compounding engine.

I can generate product direction and feature systems fast‚Äîespecially with AI as a multiplier. What I need is the bridge from blueprint ‚Üí shipped product, and mentorship that makes me independent over time.
You provide short-term breathing room so I can ship proof without collapse. In return: long-term upside with transparent reporting.

ul.li: Lifetime 20% on every app I release (net revenue defined in writing)

div.p: One trusted solo developer who is AI-native and can mentor ‚Äúvibe coding.‚Äù The goal is knowledge transfer: I become independent and we accelerate together.

ul.li: Revenue split per app we actively build together (written agreement)
AI-native: agentic mindset ‚Ä¢ MCP awareness ‚Ä¢ n8n workflows
Solo only: no teams, no agencies

div.div: Legal baseline: This is a collaboration request, not investment advice. No guaranteed returns. Revenue share terms and ‚Äúnet revenue‚Äù definitions are subject to a written agreement. NDA is required before sharing sensitive details.

div.p: Minimal workflows to restore daily structure and reduce mental load. Without automation, this becomes months of ‚Äúmonk work.‚Äù With the stack, it becomes manageable.
A portable blueprint machine (Expo): capture ideas anywhere, structure them, find them, iterate. It turns scattered knowledge into a compounding vault.

div.div: The funnel that selects the two partners

div.p: A mobile-first funnel that communicates the story credibly, filters noise, enforces NDA-first, and collects high-signal applications.

ul.li: Landing ‚Üí Role selection ‚Üí NDA ‚Üí Apply ‚Üí Done

div.div: Clear paths ‚Ä¢ strong filters ‚Ä¢ no chaos

div.p: Filter: solo only ‚Ä¢ AI-native ‚Ä¢ mentor mindset ‚Ä¢ timezone alignment preferred.
Filter: long-term mindset ‚Ä¢ trust ‚Ä¢ comfort with transparency.

ul.li: Define MVP ‚Äî strict ‚Äúdone‚Äù for both apps
Close ‚Äî freeze scope, test, demo, publish

div.div:
Snow Moon deadline: Sunday, 1 February 2026 ‚Ä¢ 23:09 (MEZ)
This is the moment where potential becomes proof ‚Äî and the loop breaks for good.
